about_the_game:
Welcome to a mystical world of eternal night and warm light! The first free DLC for Soulmask — the "Cozy Tribe Theme Pack" is now live, bringing together the mystique of obsidian with the tribe's cozy charm, adding a fresh spark to your tribe life. This pack isn't just a symbol of everlasting light and warmth in the darkest of nights, it's also your ticket to building a cozy and fortified home.

Whether you're a master builder or a devoted chieftain, now is a prime opportunity to upgrade your tribesman's homes with love! With this update, you can fill your tribe with a unique charm and warmth, creating a more comfortable and safe haven for your tribesmen. Excited? Round up your friends now and check out the new warm autumn-winter 5-piece set! Let's fill every corner with warmth and joy!

The Cozy Tribe Theme Pack contains up to 28 decorative items to give your tribe a fresh and cozy look! Join us in Soulmask for a unique and cozy autumn with friends. Let this warmth and friendship spread to every corner as you join hands to create your legendary tribe home together!

About the Theme Pack:

Tribe Totem Poles

Bring home Fang, Flint, and Claw Tribe Totem Poles to infuse your home with a unique tribal culture. No matter where your tribesmen come from, they’ll find a sense of belonging here, experiencing the warmth and pride of home.

Rainproof Campfire

No need to worry about sudden wind and rain during your adventure! The Rainproof Campfire will provide lasting warmth on every journey, keeping the night's cold at bay so you can fully enjoy the thrill of exploration.

Luxurious Double Bed

In a cozy home built with obsidian, the luxurious double bed offers a five-star hotel experience, allowing you and your partner to share sweet dreams, adding extra warmth and happiness to your life.

Fireplace

Create a unique interior design with a blackstone or stone fireplace. Each fireplace not only brings warmth and comfort to cold days, but also symbolizes the source of warmth for the tribe, illuminating every night.

Black Granite Buidling Components

Get ready to elevate your tribe's status with the majestic Black Granite components, featuring foundation, flooring, pillar, door, door frame, wall, stair, fence, roof, and bifold windows. This premium collection embodies the opulence of a mighty chieftain, bringing a touch of dark, luxurious elegance to your tribe. Every inch of your space will exude a sense of sophistication and mystique, setting your home apart from the rest.

Fire Pit

This stone fire pit not only brings light and warmth to the night, but also serves as the perfect gathering place for chiefs and tribesmen to come together, sharing legendary tales and cherished memories. The flickering flames radiate warmth and affection, carrying countless moments of joy and bliss.

Rugs

The thoughtfully designed rugs made of beast hide and textile are the perfect combination of exquisiteness and primitive style. Alternating between these two distinct rug designs adds depth and variation to the home atmosphere. Chiefs can experiment with mixing them to create a uniquely cozy space.

Decorative Greenery

Explore the vast expanse of ecosystems, from the lush wild grasses of the Meadow to the vibrant aquatic plants of the River Valley, the weird fungi of the Toxic Cave, the towering bushes of the Volcano, the windswept wild tangles of the Hills, the frost-covered thickets of the Snow Mountain, the majestic banana trees of the Rainforest, and the colorful shrooms of the Wetland. These one-of-a-kind greenery bring the spirit of the great outdoors to your tribe, providing it a unique blend of natural charm and personality.

content_descriptors.notes: Soulmask includes mild violence, shown of blood, use of alcohol, and mild partial nudity.
